Room.Name: Across the drawbridge
Room.Description: You are walking across a strong wooden bridge. Below you is a swampy moat covered in a layer of green alge. Straight ahead of you lies the gates to the mighty city of Ramadahn.

Room.Name: Before the gates of the kingdom
Room.Description: You are standing before the great iron gates of Ramadahn. Walls of stone tower in front of you with several lookout towers spaced evenly along the top of the wall. Two guards stand posted here at all times. They serve as silent watchmen to the kindom. Through the iron gates you can see the city streets.

Exit.Description: The large iron gates of the castle.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the north you can see the Market Square. Back to the south are the castle gates.

Exit.Description: The large iron gates of the castle.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the north you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The Market Square
Room.Description: You are standing in the middle of the market square. There are people scurrying all around with goods in thier hands. Carts line the edges, filled with food and different things. The vendors scream thier different sales pitches insessantly. The city streets lead off in all directions. Far off to the north lies the castle.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the south you can see the guards headquarters, and to the north lies the magistrates office. To the east you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The guards headquarters
Room.Description: This is a sort of barracks where the guards take there breaks. A large wooden table is in the center of the room where the guards eat there meals. Against the back wall there are piles of weapons and armor that the guards have taken off while they eat and relax. To the south there is a wooden door with the name "Captain Henry" carved crudely into it.

Room.Name: The Captain's room
Room.Description: You are standing in a dank room with scatered papers lying here and there. The wall is pasted with wanted posters for the outlaws of the land. There is a old wooden desk near the back of the room, where the captain spends the majority of his day.

Room.Name: The Magistrate's abode
Room.Description: This building is quite lavish compared to the rest of the buildings on The city streets The floor is covered in fine rugs and there is nice furnature placed neatly throught the room. You can hear ranting and raving from the floor above you. There is a small staircase near the back of the room, and a small door at the west wall.

Room.Name: The maids quarters
Room.Description: This is quite a desolate room. There is merely a cot in the corner and a small dresser against the wall.

Room.Name: The Magistrates bedroom
Room.Description: Another beautiful room furnished from floor to cieling. A king size bed is in the middle of the room, covered with pillows and red velvet blankets. There is a chair and desk on the south side of the room.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the east you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the north and south are houses. To the east you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: A small home
Room.Description: This is quite a humble dwelling place. Most likely whoever lives here has come with hopes of becomming a merchant. It is quit dimly lit with a single candle as the only light source.

Room.Name: A small home
Room.Description: This is quite a humble dwelling place. Most likely whoever lives here has come with hopes of becomming a merchant. It is quit dimly lit with a single candle as the only light source.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the north you hear the sounds of music and laughter. There is a wooden sign hanging from the wall of the building.

Room.Name: Iron Fist tavern
Room.Description: Just being in this place makes you feel more happy. Tables are scattered around and people are laughing and drinking together. This room has quite a high ceiling, and the woodwork is very beautiful. A few fellows are dancing in the corner as they play a lively tune. Before you know it the burly man at the bar screams at you. The bartender screams. "Arh! What can I do for ye! A bottle of my finest brews will drown yer woes!"

Room.Name: End of the road
Room.Description: You have reached the end of this street. The massive walls of the kingdom stand before you. You realize this is the type of place where vandals hang out, so you decide it would be best if you turned back and headed down the street again.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. North of here lies the butcher, and to the south is an apocathary. To the west you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The Butcher
Room.Description: The stench in this room is quite pungent. Ribcages and other body parts line the walls hung on iron hooks. You wonder how anyone could work in such an atmosphere.

Room.Name: The Apothecary
Room.Description: This room is a little bit misty. The walls are lined with shelves, that hold potions and vials of a all different colors, shapes, and sizes. Now and then you hear an explosion near you.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the west you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. North of here is the cobbler. To the west you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The Cobbler
Room.Description: This is a very simple building. There is a wooden counter across the front of the room where you came in. On the other side there is a man working at his bench. On the back wall there is a shelf with several shoes on it. On the wall right next to you there is a plaque.

ExtraDescription.Description: Most valuable customer. Deomanix, The great boot in the sky.

Room.Name: End of the road
Room.Description: You have reached the end of this street. The massive walls of the kingdom stand before you. You realize this is the type of place where vandals hang out, so you decide it would be best if you turned back and headed down the street again.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the south you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The city streets
Room.Description: You are standing on a dirt road that travels througout the kingdom of Ramadahn. It smells a little bit on this street. This is where many of the serfs come to sell thier agriculteral goods. To the south you can see the Market Square.

Room.Name: The common square
Room.Description: This square is not like the busy Market Square. This square is quite peaceful, it has benches here and there, and a giant fountain in the middle. To the east and west lies Merchants row. South of here the Market Square can been seen. To the North lies the road to the castle.

Room.Name: Merchant's row
Room.Description: These streets are quite a step up from the streets south of here. This is where the merchants call home. The streets here are much cleaner, and it actually smells quite nice. To the north and south are merchant's homes.

Room.Name: A merchant's home
Room.Description: A very spacious and elegant home. The walls are covered in beautiful tapestrys. The room is very well furnished, and is quite neat. There are several lampstands that light the room, and incense burns on a table in the center of the room.

Room.Name: A merchant's home
Room.Description: A very spacious and elegant home. The walls are covered in beautiful tapestrys. The room is very well furnished, and is quite neat. There are several lampstands that light the room, and incense burns on a table in the center of the room.

You realize this is the type of place where vandals hang out, so you decide it would be best if you turned back and headed down the street again.

ExtraDescription.Description: You can see the slight outline of what seems to be a hidden entrance.

Room.Name: A hidden room
Room.Description: This very dark room, is illuminated by one candle in the center. Shadows dance across the wall. As you look around yourself you notice somthing reflecting the light near the back corner. Now and then you hear the sound of someone breathing.

Room.Name: Merchant's row
Room.Description: These streets are quite a step up from the streets south of here. This is where the merchants call home. The streets here are much cleaner, and it actually smells quite nice. To the north and south are merchant's homes.

You realize this is the type of place where vandals hang out, so you decide it would be best if you turned back and headed down the street again.

Room.Name: A road to the castle
Room.Description: This is a very well kept road. The sides of the road are lined with small stones. And there has been flowers planted on either side. The sweat aroma of the flowers seems to make you feel peaceful.

Room.Name: A road to the castle
Room.Description: This is a very well kept road. The sides of the road are lined with small stones. And there has been flowers planted on either side. The sweat aroma of the flowers seems to make you feel peaceful.

Room.Name: A road to the castle
Room.Description: The treacherous path through the mountains is a rocky, uneven track that winds its way through jagged peaks and valleys. Loose stones and gravel make the footing uncertain, while steep drop-offs and jutting rocks pose a constant danger. In some places, the path narrows to a thin ledge, with a sheer drop on one side and a towering cliff on the other. Despite the danger, the path provides the only route through the mountains.

Room.Name: A road near the castle
Room.Description: This is a very well kept road. The sides of the road are lined with small stones. And there has been flowers planted on either side. The sweat aroma of the flowers seems to make you feel peaceful. To the north you see the castle rising high above the trees.

Room.Name: Before the castle gates
Room.Description: You are standing before the largest and most beautiful structure in the land. The castle of Ramadahn. The grey stone rises high above you, and you feel a bit dizzy as you look toward the top most spires. Directly in front of you lies the large iron gates.

Room.Name: Inside the castle gates
Room.Description: You are standing in the entrance to the castle. Behind you lies the first gates, and before you lies the secondary gate. To the east and west lie guard rooms.

Room.Name: A guard room
Room.Description: This is a simple stone room. The guards may choose to interview people here before letting them into the castle. It also holds extra weapons.

Room.Name: A guard room
Room.Description: This is a simple stone room. The guards may choose to interview people here before letting them into the castle. It also holds extra weapons.

Room.Name: The Courtyard
Room.Description: This is a most beautiful sight. This very large courtyard contains beautiful trees, flowers, and a pond. There are stone benches here and there, with people sitting and talking on them. In the pond you notice there are many colerful fish swimming throughout it. The courtyard continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Courtyard
Room.Description: This is a most beautiful sight. This very large courtyard contains beautiful trees, flowers, and a pond. There are stone benches here and there, with people sitting and talking on them. In the pond you notice there are many colerful fish swimming throughout it. The courtyard continues in all directions.

Room.Name: The Courtyard
Room.Description: This is a most beautiful sight. This very large courtyard contains beautiful trees, flowers, and a pond. There are stone benches here and there, with people sitting and talking on them. In the pond you notice there are many colerful fish swimming throughout it. The courtyard continues in all directions.

There are stone benches here and there, with people sitting and talking on them. In the pond you notice there are many colerful fish swimming throughout it. The courtyard continues in all directions.

There are stone benches here and there, with people sitting and talking on them. In the pond you notice there are many colerful fish swimming throughout it. The courtyard continues in all directions.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you. To the west there is a large wooden door.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. There a iron bound door to north.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you. There are some double doors to the east.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: Entrance to the west wing
Room.Description: You are standing just inside the west wing of the castle. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway. There are wooden doors to the north and south.

Room.Name: A guest's room
Room.Description: You are in the middle of a very plain room. There is a bed and a dresser. There seems to be just enough for a short stay. The door back to the hall lies to the south.

Room.Name: A guest's room
Room.Description: You are in the middle of a very plain room. There is a bed and a dresser. There seems to be just enough for a short stay. The door back to the hall lies north.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway. The hall continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway. The hall continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway. The hall continues to the east and west. There is a darker hallway to the south.

Room.Name: A candle-lit hallway
Room.Description: This is quite an eerie hallway. It is very long, and the only thing illuminating the way is several candles mounted on the walls. As you walk down the hallyway the shadows dance here and there, causing you to see things.

Room.Name: A candle-lit hallway
Room.Description: This is quite an eerie hallway. It is very long, and the only thing illuminating the way is several candles mounted on the walls. As you walk down the hallyway the shadows dance here and there, causing you to see things.

Room.Name: A candle-lit hallway

Room.Name: A candle-lit hallway
Room.Description: This is quite an eerie hallway. It is very long, and the only thing illuminating the way is several candles mounted on the walls. As you walk down the hallyway the shadows dance here and there, causing you to see things. Directly to the south there is an iron bound door.

Room.Name: Top of the spiral stairway
Room.Description: You are on stairs made of the same grey stone as the rest of the castle. Candles light the path downward. You can hear moanings of anguish and despair as you head down. The door back to the hallway is to the north.

Room.Name: On a spiral stairway
Room.Description: You are on stairs made of the same grey stone as the rest of the castle. Candles light the path downward. You can hear moanings of anguish and despair as you head down.

Room.Name: On a sprial stairway
Room.Description: You are on stairs made of the same grey stone as the rest of the castle. Candles light the path downward. You can hear moanings of anguish and despair as you head down.

Room.Name: On a spiral stairway
Room.Description: You are on stairs made of the same grey stone as the rest of the castle. Candles light the path downward. You can hear moanings of anguish and despair as you head down.

Room.Name: Bottom of the sprial stairway
Room.Description: You have reached the bottom of the spiral stairway. In front of you is another iron bound doorway. The cries of anguish are much louder here. The stairway leads back up to the hall.

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the north. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue.

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the north. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue. Imediatly to your left lies a wooden door with a piece of paper nailed to it.

Room.Name: The dungeon keeper's room
Room.Description: This room is covered in dirt and dust. There is only one desk in the room with a mean looking fellow sitting at it. There is a key hook with several keys on it on the wall.

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the north. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue.

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the north. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue. There are cells to the east and to the west.

Room.Name: A cell
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark cell. A cot is the only piece of furnature in this room.

Room.Name: A cell
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark cell. A cot is the only piece of furnature in this room.

Room.Name: A turn in the hallway
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the east. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue.

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the east. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue. There is a strange door to the north. There are marks on the floor here that look as something was dragged through the room.

Room.Name: A putrid room
Room.Description: You are standing before a pile of corpses at least 15 feet tall. This must be where they dump the dead of ramadahn. However you have no idea why they would be down here. You see somthing glinting in the pile, but should you reach in there?

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the east. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue. There are marks on the floor here that look as something was dragged through the room.

Room.Name: In the dungeon
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the east. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue. There are cells to the north and south. There are marks on the floor here that look as something was dragged through the room.

Room.Name: A cell
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark cell. A cot is the only piece of furnature in this room.

Room.Name: A cell
Room.Description: You are standing in a dark cell. A cot is the only piece of furnature in this room.

Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the east. Room.Name: A turn in the hall
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon continues to the east. However you are not quite sure if you want to continue. The hall turns south here. There are marks on the floor here that look as something was dragged through the room.

Room.Name: End of the hall
Room.Description: This is a dank pit of hell if you have ever seen one. The smell of human excretion permiates the air. The hall through the dungeon ends here. The marks on the floor seem to end here,however there seems to be something outlined in dust on the floor.

Room.Name: Through the trap door
Room.Description: You have just crawled through a small trap door. To the north here there is a pitch black door. The marks on the floor seem to continue through the door.

Room.Name: A bloody room
Room.Description: You have entered the room of a necromancer. You can tell by the organs and body parts strewn everywhere. There is a large medical table in the center of the room, and there are necromantic symbols everywhere. Whoevere has been working in this room was working on something big!

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway. There are ornate double doors to the north. There is a golden plaque on the wall next to the door.

Room.Name: The War Room
Room.Description: You are standing in the castle's war room. This is where the King and his knights, contemplate what they will do in a situation of war. There is a giant round table in the middle of the room, with the emblem of Ramadahn inlaid into it. There are great tapestrys hung from the walls, and a giant rug on the floor.

Room.Name: The western wing
Room.Description: You are standing in an extremely long hall. The hall seems to go on farther than you can see. There a suits of armor lined against the walls, each baring the code of Ramadahn. A long wed carpets stretches down the length of the hallway.

Room.Name: The bottom of a staircase
Room.Description: You are standing at the bottom of a large staircase. It is a quite plain stone structure, and seems to lead upward to one of the castles spires.

Room.Name: A covered archway
Room.Description: You are standing undearneath the archway that surrounds the courtyard. It is a high stone archway with beautiful chaneliers hanging down. You can see several wooden doors underneath the archway ahead of you.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Royal wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the entrance to the royal wing of the castle. This wing of the castle where the king of Ramadahn dwells. The hall stretches to the north and there is a golden rug running down as far as you can see.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble. There is a kitchen to the east.

Room.Name: The Kitchen
Room.Description: You have just entered a very large kitchen. There are cooks and servants running around everywhere making sure the kings food is satifactory. You are standing in the servants area where they prepare the food on plates. Farther back is where the cooks are working.

Room.Name: The Kitchen
Room.Description: You have just entered a very large kitchen. There are cooks and servants running around everywhere making sure the kings food is satifactory. In this section you see the cooks running back and forth sturring the soups, and making sure the meat doesnt burn.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble. There is a small hallway to the west here.

Room.Name: A small hallway
Room.Description: This small hallway is where some of the kings servants gather. To the north there is a door with the symbol of a jester. To the west there is door with a sign that says "Concubine's". Lastly to the south there is a door with a wizards hat carved in it.

Room.Name: The Jester's room
Room.Description: This is the royal jester's quarters. Gags and things the jester uses to make the kind laugh a laying all over the place. The only piece of furnature in the room are a chair and a large wooden chest.

Room.Name: The room of concubines
Room.Description: As you step in this room your nose is assaulted by perfume. Pillows cover the floor and there is an abundance of silk in this room. This is where the women wait for the king to beckon them. You have a hard time leaving this room.

Room.Name: The Magician's quarters
Room.Description: This room is scattered with wand's of every shape and size. This is where the magician prepares illusions to ammuse the king. Its a shame none of these wands really work. There is a single chair in the middle of the room where the magician usually sits.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: The Royal wing
Room.Description: This hall stretches off to the north. The cieling in this hall is rounded, and is covered with stensiled designs. You are standing on a golden rug that continues throughout the halls. There are royal guards patroling these halls so you decide you had better not cause any trouble.

Room.Name: Before the Throne room
Room.Description: You are standing before two large golden doors. Beyond these doors are the kings throne and bed chambers. It is considered a punishable act to enter the chambers without being invited. Your not so sure that you have been invited.

Room.Name: The Throne room
Room.Description: You are standing in a spectacular room. There whole room seems to be guilded with gold. And there are large windows on either side of the room. Directly to the north lies the kings throne. It is inlaid with gems of every kind imaginable, and has a soft red cushion. Behind the throne there is a well guarded door.

Room.Name: Bottom of the staircase
Room.Description: You are standing at the bottom of the northern spire's staircase. Up these stairs is where the king's quarters lie. It may be a good idea to go back the way you came.

Room.Name: A door before the King's quarters
Room.Description: You are standing before the door to the king's quarters. It is a heavy wooden door guilded with gold. The staircase leads back down. Perhaps it would be the best idea to go back down before you disturb the king.

Room.Name: The King's Quarters
Room.Description: You are standing in the bedroom of the king himself. This is the most lavish room you have ever seen. Precious jewels and metals are common place, and his bed is a masterpiece of carved wood. The kings dresser is on the west wall. Out the window on the south wall you can get a view of the whole kingdown, it is breathtaking.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Eastern wing
Room.Description: This is the entrance to the eastern wing, or more commonly called the noble wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: On the staircase
Room.Description: As you climb the stairs to the top of the spire you start to feel tingley all over. You can also hear a soft humming.

Room.Name: Top of the Western spire
Room.Description: At the top of this staircase there is a strong door made of a pearly material. The door itself seems to hum softly.

Room.Name: Room of the great sorcerer
Room.Description: You have entered the room of the great socerer of Ramadahn. It is said that this man is the reason for the many victories in battle. The room seems to overflow with enchantments. There is a rocking chair neer the one window in the spire. Also there is a bookcase against the northern wall.

Room.Name: The hidden room
Room.Description: As you enter this room you no longer wonder why not many people have seen the sorcerer. This room has served as his hidden sanctuary from those who would disturb his meditation.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls. There are doors to the north and south.

Room.Name: A noble's room
Room.Description: You are standing in a very nice room. It is not very large, but is clean and has all nessisary acomidations. This is where the nobles from visiting lands make thier stay.

Room.Name: A noble's room
Room.Description: You are standing in a very nice room. It is not very large, but is clean and has all nessisary acomidations. This is where the nobles from visiting lands make thier stay.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls. There are doors to the north and south.

Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls. There is a door to the north that is a bit larger than the others.

Room.Name: A noble's room
Room.Description: This room is much nicer than the other rooms. There is a large bed and dresser in the corner, and the floor is covered in a large fur rug.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls. There is a large hall to the north.

Room.Name: The great hall of Ramadahn
Room.Description: You are standing in a giant hall. It has a high cieling with wooden supports. There are windows on the east and west sides that look into the courtyard's. Long tables line the room, and the the King's throne is near the north end.

Room.Name: The great hall of Ramadahn
Room.Description: You are standing in a giant hall. It has a high cieling with wooden supports. There are windows on the east and west sides that look into the courtyard's. Long tables line the room, and the the King's throne is near the north end.

Room.Name: The great hall of Ramadahn
Room.Description: You are standing in a giant hall. It has a high cieling with wooden supports. There are windows on the east and west sides that look into the courtyard's. Long tables line the room, and the the King's throne is near the north end.

Room.Name: The great hall of Ramadahn
Room.Description: You are standing in a giant hall. It has a high cieling with wooden supports. There are windows on the east and west sides that look into the courtyard's. Long tables line the room, and the the King's throne is near the north end.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls. To the north is the Captain of the Royal Guard's room. To the south are the Royal Guard's barracks.

Room.Name: The Captain's room
Room.Description: You are standing in a very neat and well kept office. There is a bookshelf at the back wall. A desk in the middle of the room. There are also several suits of armor against the west wall.

Room.Name: The Barracks
Room.Description: This is where the Royal guard's sleep. The room smells of body oder, and sweat. The room is filled with bunk beds. There are chests neatly at the foot of each bed, where the guards keep thier personal belongings.

Room.Name: The Barracks
Room.Description: This is where the Royal guard's sleep. The room smells of body oder, and sweat. The room is filled with bunk beds. There are chests neatly at the foot of each bed, where the guards keep thier personal belongings.

Room.Name: The Barracks
Room.Description: This is where the Royal guard's sleep. The room smells of body oder, and sweat. The room is filled with bunk beds. There are chests neatly at the foot of each bed, where the guards keep thier personal belongings.

Room.Name: The Barracks
Room.Description: This is where the Royal guard's sleep. The room smells of body oder, and sweat. The room is filled with bunk beds. There are chests neatly at the foot of each bed, where the guards keep thier personal belongings. There is a book case against the south wall here, with scrap marks near it.

Room.Name: The secret room
Room.Description: Well, before you is a small room with rounded gambling tables. I guess even the guards need to have thier fun. The walls are covered in paintings of naked women dancing about. There are several guards that seem very worried you have found them out.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: The eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls.

Room.Name: End of the eastern wing
Room.Description: You are standing in the eastern wing. This is the area provided for the visiting nobles from other kingdoms. There is a red carpet running the lenght of the hall, and there are fine paintings on the walls. To the north is a steel door that has several jewels inlaid in it.

Room.Name: A narrow hallway
Room.Description: You are not quite sure what this hallway is for at first. Judging the pink tapestrys on the wall, and the pink carpet going down the hall. You realize this is the way to the Princess of Ramadahn's chamber.

Room.Name: A narrow hallway
Room.Description: You are not quite sure what this hallway is for at first. Judging the pink tapestrys on the wall, and the pink carpet going down the hall. You realize this is the way to the Princess of Ramadahn's chamber.

Room.Name: A narrow hallway
Room.Description: You are not quite sure what this hallway is for at first. Judging the pink tapestrys on the wall, and the pink carpet going down the hall. You realize this is the way to the Princess of Ramadahn's chamber.

Room.Name: Bottom of the staircase
Room.Description: You are standing at the end of the narrow hallway. A spiral staircase stands in front of you, that lead up into the easternmost spire. As you start up the stairs sweet perfume wafts into your nostrils.

Room.Name: The Princess's chamber
Room.Description: This room is extremely feminine. Pink is the dominant color in this chamber. There is a large bed with pillows stacked upon it. There is also a large dresser with a mirror. There is an inumberable amount of perfumes and other feminine things stacked upon the dresser.

Room.Name: Before a mighty kingdom
Room.Description: You are standing before a massive structure. There is a gigantic stone wall in front of you. You can see a large castle rising above the walls, with giant spires scraping the sky. Directly in front of you lies a drawbridge to the castle gates.

Room.Name: Door before the Princess's room
Room.Description: You are standing at the top of the staircase. Directly in front of you is a beautiful wooden door with the emblem of Ramadahn carved into it. You can hear somone humming to herself on the other side of the door.

Room.Name: A Broad Forest Wagon Trail
Room.Description: The trail snakes through a dense thicket of towering oaks and cypresses, their gnarled roots and low-hanging branches obscuring the sky above. Shafts of golden sunlight trickle through the foliage, casting dappled patterns on the forest floor below. The air is thick with the earthy scent of moss and loam, and the occasional chirp of a bird or rustle of underbrush is the only sign of life in this secluded place. As you follow the path, you catch glimpses of a great white city looming in the distance to the west, while to the north, the rugged foothills rise steeply towards a mighty kingdom perched on high.

Room.Name: Winding Path Through the Mountains
Room.Description: The treacherous path through the mountains is a rocky, uneven track that winds its way through jagged peaks and valleys. Loose stones and gravel make the footing uncertain, while steep drop-offs and jutting rocks pose a constant danger. In some places, the path narrows to a thin ledge, with a sheer drop on one side and a towering cliff on the other. Despite the danger, the path provides the only route through the mountains.

Room.Name: A Broad Forest Wagon Trail
Room.Description: The trail snakes through a dense thicket of towering oaks and cypresses, their gnarled roots and low-hanging branches obscuring the sky above. Shafts of golden sunlight trickle through the foliage, casting dappled patterns on the forest floor below. The air is thick with the earthy scent of moss and loam, and the occasional chirp of a bird or rustle of underbrush is the only sign of life in this secluded place. As you follow the path, you catch glimpses of a great white city looming in the distance to the west, while to the north, the rugged foothills rise steeply towards a mighty kingdom perched on high.

NPC.name: silver knight
NPC.description: The knight peers intently at you.
NPC.longDescription: A knight clad in silver armor guards his post.

NPC.name: boy small
NPC.description: He giggles and smiles at you.
NPC.longDescription: A small boy is here playing in the street.

NPC.name: small girl
NPC.description: She smiles at you warmly.
NPC.longDescription: A small girl is here playing with her friends.

NPC.name: cityguard guard
NPC.description: He glares at you sternly.
NPC.longDescription: A cityguard patrols the area.

NPC.name: captain henry
NPC.description: He looks back at with a look of apathy.
NPC.longDescription: The Captain of the cityguards is here sleeping.

NPC.name: maid
NPC.description: The maid looks back at you sadly.
NPC.longDescription: The maid shivers here with a worried look on her face.

NPC.name: magistrate man
NPC.description: He scowls in your general direction.
NPC.longDescription: The magistrate is here screaming obscenities at his maid.

NPC.name: girl
NPC.description: She glances at you and continues to play here violin.
NPC.longDescription: A girl is here trying to play the violin.

NPC.name: bartender man
NPC.description: He gives you a big smile and turns back to his bartending.
NPC.longDescription: The bartender is here selling drinks.

NPC.name: drunkard
NPC.description: He thrusts his mug high in the air and gives you a goofy grin.
NPC.longDescription: A drunkard is here blabbering incessantly.

NPC.name: butcher man
NPC.description: He wipes some blood on his apron and gives you a goofy grin.
NPC.longDescription: The butcher is here cutting up some meat.

NPC.name: apothecary man
NPC.description: He smiles at you with a twinkle in his eye.
NPC.longDescription: The apothecary is here mixing a potion.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: cobbler man
NPC.description: He glances at you out of the corner of his eye while he continues to work.
NPC.longDescription: The cobbler is here working on a pair of shoes.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Thief Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: merchant man
NPC.description: The merchant stares back at you, appraising your worth.
NPC.longDescription: A merchant is here thinking about ways to make money.

NPC.name: junzo thief man sneak
NPC.description: He glares back at you with a look of malace.
NPC.longDescription: Junzo the sneak is hiding here in the shadows.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Thief AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak Hide

NPC.name: golden knight
NPC.description: The knight peers back at you intently.
NPC.longDescription: A golden knight is here guarding his post.

NPC.name: maiden woman
NPC.description: She smiles and continues on her way.
NPC.longDescription: A maiden is here walking through the courtyard.

NPC.name: ambassador galadon
NPC.description: He glances at you slightly and goes about his buisness.
NPC.longDescription: The ambassador from Midgaard is here.

NPC.name: ambassador New Thalos
NPC.description: He glances at you and goes about his buisness.
NPC.longDescription: The ambassador from New Thalos is here being diplomatic.

NPC.name: dungeon keeper
NPC.description: He is snoring loudly.
NPC.longDescription: The dungeon keeper is here taking a quick nap.

NPC.name: prisoner
NPC.description: He doesnt even have the strength to look back at you.
NPC.longDescription: A prisoner is here wasting away before your eyes.

NPC.name: necromancer ramadahn
NPC.description: He turns in your direction and hisses violently.
NPC.longDescription: A dark figure is here working over a corpse.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Undead Mage AreaAttack AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: golem flesh
NPC.description: He lets out a loud groan.
NPC.longDescription: A mass of rotting flesh is standing here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Undead Warrior AreaAttack AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: cook man
NPC.description: The cook is too busy to look back at you.
NPC.longDescription: A cook is here sturring some broth.

NPC.name: servant
NPC.description: He nods at you politely and moves on his busy way.
NPC.longDescription: A servant is running around here.

NPC.name: jester
NPC.description: The jester looks at you crosseyed.
NPC.longDescription: The jester is here racking his brain for a new gag.

NPC.name: concubine
NPC.description: She licks her lips and smiles at you.
NPC.longDescription: A concubine is here looking 'ready'.

NPC.name: magician
NPC.description: He gives you a worried look and continues to thumb through a book.
NPC.longDescription: A magician is here looking worried over his new illusion.

NPC.name: king ramadahn
NPC.description: The King screams at your intrusion.
NPC.longDescription: The King is here stroking his beard.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: sorcerer mephibosheth
NPC.description: His eyes flare with blinding light as he looks you over.
NPC.longDescription: A sorcerer is here chanting softly.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Mage Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: noble
NPC.description: He barely glances at you and trots down the hall.
NPC.longDescription: A noble is here making sure he looks presentable.

NPC.name: captain guard royal
NPC.description: The captain pays no attention to the likes of you.
NPC.longDescription: The Captain of the Royal guard is here ordering people around.
NPC.shortDescription: the Captain of the Royal Guard

NPC.name: princess ramadahn
NPC.description: She greets and smiles at you warmly.
NPC.longDescription: The Princess stands here smiling.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil PassDoor DetectIllusion

Item.LongDescription: A pile of fine cloth is here.

Item.Name: lamb chops

Item.Name: potion teal
Item.LongDescription: A teal potion is frothing here.

Item.Name: potion black

Item.Name: dagger sharp

Item.LongDescription: A fine bracer lies here.

Item.LongDescription: A royal ring of a great king lies here.

Item.Name: gloves royal
